publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-479# Mr Jamie Stone: Marketing of Food Products—That the Parliament recognises the quality of food products originating in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross but agrees that better marketing and promotion of these products would greatly boost the local economy. R

S1M-479# Mr Jamie Stone: Marketing of Food Products—That the Parliament recognises the quality of food products originating in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross but agrees that better marketing and promotion of these products would greatly boost the local economy. R
S1M-479# Marketing of Food Products (lodged on 28 January 2000) Rhoda Grant*, Mr John Munro*

S1M-479# Mr Jamie Stone: Marketing of Food Products-That the Parliament recognises the quality of food products originating in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross but agrees that better marketing and promotion of these products would greatly boost the local economy. R Supported by: Rhoda Grant, Mr John Munro, Nora Radcliffe*

R Supported by: Rhoda Grant, Mr John Munro, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-479# Marketing of Food Products (lodged on 28 January 2000) Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-479# Mr Jamie Stone: Marketing of Food Products—That the Parliament recognises the quality of food products originating in Caithness, Sutherland and Easter Ross but agrees that better marketing and promotion of these products would greatly boost the local economy.
